AK.name: Alaska
AK.description: Seasonal fire and travel conditions change quickly in Alaska. Please review local access notices before your trip.

offices.name: Anchorage Aurora Outpost
offices.description: Anchorage area permits may require weekend travel restrictions during breakup season.

fuelwood.name: Fuelwood Permit — Anchorage North
fuelwood.description: Personal use only. Dead and down collection in designated areas.

fuelwood.name: Fuelwood Permit — Anchorage South
fuelwood.description: Personal use only. Check seasonal restrictions and road access.

fuelwood.name: Fuelwood Permit — Subsistence (ANILCA, No fee)
fuelwood.description: No-fee permit for eligible subsistence users. Personal/family subsistence use only.

eligibility.basis: ANILCA Title VIII subsistence eligibility (16 U.S.C. § 3113)
eligibility.label: I certify that I qualify for subsistence uses under ANILCA (16 U.S.C. § 3113) for this no-fee permit.
eligibility.intro: This no-fee permit option is available only to eligible subsistence users in Alaska.
bullets: I am eligible for subsistence uses as defined in 16 U.S.C. § 3113.
I will use the forest products collected under this permit for personal or family subsistence use (not commercial resale).
I understand that false statements may be subject to penalties.

fuelwood.name: Fuelwood Permit — Free Use (No fee)
fuelwood.description: No-fee personal use permit issued under free-use authority. Not for commercial resale.

christmas.name: Christmas Tree Permit — Chugach Access
christmas.description: Harvest only within designated areas. Follow stump height and size limits.

christmas.name: Christmas Tree Permit — Turnagain Arm
christmas.description: Limited areas; verify winter travel conditions before departure.

christmas.name: Christmas Tree Permit — Free Use (No fee)
christmas.description: No-fee personal use tree permit for designated areas.

mushrooms.name: Morel Mushroom Permit (Personal Use)
mushrooms.description: Personal use collection. Seasonal restrictions may apply.

mushrooms.name: Chanterelle Mushroom Permit (Personal Use)
mushrooms.description: Personal use only. No commercial resale permitted.

offices.name: Fairbanks Frost District

eligibility.label: I certify that I qualify for subsistence uses under ANILCA (16 U.S.C. § 3113) for this no-fee permit.
eligibility.intro: This no-fee permit option is available only to eligible subsistence users in Alaska.
bullets: I am eligible for subsistence uses as defined in 16 U.S.C. § 3113.
I will use the forest products collected under this permit for personal or family subsistence use (not commercial resale).
I understand that false statements may be subject to penalties.
